name: The Good, the Bad & the Queen
description: '''The Good, the Bad & the Queen''' were an English [[art rock]] [[Supergroup (music)|supergroup]] composed of singer [[Damon Albarn]] of [[Blur (band)|Blur]] and [[Gorillaz]], bassist [[Paul Simonon]] of [[the Clash]], guitarist [[Simon Tong]] of the [[The Verve|Verve]], and drummer [[Tony Allen (musician)|Tony Allen]] of [[Fela Kuti]]'s band Africa '70. They released their [[The Good, the Bad & the Queen (album)|self-titled debut album]] in 2007. Their second album, ''[[Merrie Land]],'' coproduced with [[Tony Visconti]], was released in 2018. They disbanded in 2019.
